definition: Laba rice porridge festival, on the 8th day of the 12th lunar month
12th lunar month/preserved (meat, fish etc)
eight/8
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: The Laba Festival, the day in most parts of China have the custom of eating Laba porridge.
sentences.chinese: 臘八節這天我國大多數地區都有喫臘八粥的習俗。

sentences.english: The date of the Laba Festival usually falls in mid-January.
sentences.chinese: 臘八節的陽曆日期通常在1月中旬。

sentences.english: Laba Festival there are two legendary origin.
sentences.chinese: 臘八節的由來有兩個傳說。
